page.title: 15Farmers' Attitudes
page.content: All Dairy Farms have had to cut their milk quota by{9%. In this area some actually reduced the milk yield and some reduced the size of their herd.One small farmer felt the quota was unfair as the government assessed the yield on a poor year for him.All the farmers felt that they {would not}wish to leave the{E.E.C. All our farmers felt that they should respect the country side within reason and that wildlife should be controlled if necessary.{Foxes}and particularly {rabbits}were a nuisance.The Hunt,a pack of hounds and guns,were some methods used.{Badgers}were not a problem at present. One farmer was upset at{losing}good land to road improvements and had major problems with{litter}and{rubbish being dumped on his farmland.It was a danger to his animals.
